programme.desc: Embark on a two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all corners of Korea! The 2 Days and 1 Night cast travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of neighbours and beautiful nature.(n)

programme.title: Brilliant Heritage
programme.desc: This pleasant and heartwarming family drama describes the journey of a 33-year-old single woman who conspires to have a fake marriage with an old billionaire, but comes to find true meaning of sweet home together with his four sons.(n)

programme.title: Man In A Veil
programme.desc: A man has the intelligence of a seven-year-old due to an accident. One day, he meets with a miraculous situation on the edge of his life. After that, he dream about revenge for something.(n)

programme.title: Blade Man
programme.desc: Joo Hongbin is capable, rich and good-looking, but he is so ill-tempered! One day, this supercilious guy turns into a monster. When he is angry, blades spring out from his body. Sedong, a woman with a bright personality and Chang, his first love's son appear, making him confused.(n)

programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible
programme.desc: Korea's "Comedy King" Lee Gyenggyu who's also known for his love for dogs, along with the country's most famous dog expert Kang Hyungwook, team up to study how humans and pets live in peace and harmony.(n)

programme.title: Discovery Of Love
programme.desc: A woman has a conflict between her new love and old love. Han Yeoreum has started a new relationship with a perfect guy called Nam Hajin. However, her ex-boyfriend Kang Taeha returns while regretting his past. A story of a love triangle among these three young people.(n)

programme.title: The Return Of Superman

programme.title: Gracious Revenge
programme.desc: This drama tells the story of a woman who was raised as a tool for her mother's revenge, and her dangerous love life.(n)

programme.title: Homemade Love Story
programme.desc: Homemade Love Story tells the story of various people who gather at a house called Samgwang Villa, and how they start off as strangers but begin to open up their hearts and love one another.(n)

programme.title: KBS World News Today
programme.desc: Bringing you KBS World daily English news, anchored by Choi Kyu-yeon.(n)

programme.title: KBS Disaster Information Center
programme.desc: This is the first disaster-related programme that provides information about natural disasters.(n)

programme.title: Boss In The Mirror
programme.desc: Korean celebrity-bosses go through self-examination to create a better working environment for their employees.(n)

programme.title: IDOL On Quiz
programme.desc: K-Culture has become mainstream all over the world, with many people now trying to learn Korean language to understand K-Culture. IDOL on QUIZ will help international idols to upgrade their Korean language skills!(n)

programme.title: Boss In The Mirror
programme.desc: Korean celebrity-bosses go through self-examination to create a better working environment for their employees.(n)

programme.title: Suddenly Twenty
programme.desc: Parn is a stubborn old woman in her 70s whose only pleasure in life is to brag about her son who she single-handedly raised to be a professor. One day, she learns that her son is planning to send her off to a nursing home.(n)

programme.title: The Farewell Girls
programme.desc: Three girls have been chasing their music dreams, but they keep failing until they met the owner of a funeral service company. They perform with a pair of funeral singers, but they do not get along well.(n)

programme.title: Napping Princess
programme.desc: In the near future, a high-school senior discovers that events in her waking life begin to parallel events in her dreams.(n)

programme.title: The Tag Along
programme.desc: After a funeral, a family is watching a trip video in which a weird-looking little girl in red is found tagging along the relative who passed away. But no one remembers seeing her anywhere during the trip.(n)

programme.title: Distance
programme.desc: Businessman Chen travels to Guangxi for work. During a site visit, he catches sight of his estranged father. The father he resents is now a crippled old man who doesn't recognise him.(n)

programme.title: Little Forest
programme.desc: A young woman grows tired of life in the city and returns to her hometown in the countryside.(n)

programme.title: The Leakers
programme.desc: After a mutated Zika epidemic breaks out in Malaysia, an illegal hacker group, The Leakers, tries to disclose pharmaceutical company AMANAH Malaysia's conspiracy and crimes.(n)

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: A girl ends up at an abandoned building while playing an augmented reality game. She wins the game and takes a photo to commemorate her win. Later, she realises there is a mysterious girl in the photo she has taken. Worse, the mystery girl is now haunting her.(n)

programme.title: Mojin: The Lost Legend
programme.desc: Seasoned grave robbers Hu Ba Yi, Wang Kai Xuan and Shirley Yang hail from a long line of tomb raiders, but the trio have decided to hang up their boots. They get lured back into their old trade by a mysterious businesswoman who offers Kai Xuan a large sum of money to locate an ancient tomb.(n)

programme.title: The Mobfathers
programme.desc: After serving a five-year sentence, gang leader Chuck returns to the outside world, only to find that it's not exactly a glorious welcome that awaits him.(n)

programme.title: Marry A Rich Man
programme.desc: Me makes a wish upon a falling star - to marry a rich husband. She embarks on her adventure to seek a wealthy mate. Will she be able to find true happiness?(n)

programme.title: The Banquet
programme.desc: A loose adaptation of Hamlet, which is set in an empire in chaos. The Emperor, the Empress, the Crown Prince, the Minister and the General all have their own enemies they would like to finish off at a night banquet.(n)

programme.title: The Viral Factor
programme.desc: International Security Affairs agent Jon is on a dangerous mission to escort a criminal scientist to another country. En route, a member of his team, Sean, turns out to be a traitor and shoots Jon in the head while kidnapping the scientist.(n)

programme.title: David Loman 2
programme.desc: Comedian Zhu Ge Liang reprises his role as gang boss Loman who has since settled down to a more lawful life, running a guesthouse with wife Nana. However, things are no less peaceful with Loman welcoming gangsters into his guesthouse for free.(n)

programme.title: Burning
programme.desc: Based on the Japanese novel Barn Burning by Haruki Murakami, Burning centres on the mystery surrounding chaebol Ben, delivery man Jong-su and young lady Hae-mi.(n)

programme.title: Shining Moment
programme.desc: After being sidelined by the gymnastics team, Yu quits and reinvents himself as a Latin dance instructor. He assembles a group of children for a Latin dance competition. Can Yu teach them to dance?(n)

programme.title: Call Of Heroes
programme.desc: During the warlords era in China, a village located in rural area called Pucheng falls into danger when the cruel commandant Cao from the enemy troops arrives and kills the innocent. The guardians of Pucheng are desperate to fight against Cao and protect their homeland.(n)

programme.title: My Best Summer
programme.desc: Geng Geng had been an ordinary girl before her entry to the best high school in the province by chance. She doesn't like her life there until she meets Yu Huai, her seatmate - their names make up word 'Geng geng yu huai', meaning 'Unforgettable memories'.(n)

programme.title: Wu Yen
programme.desc: Emperor Qi, the male ruler of an ancient kingdom overrun by warring tribes, is set to marry the warrior-heroine Wu Yen when a mischievous, bisexual sorceress known as Yin Chun falls in love with both of them and begins meddling in their affairs.(n)

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a story of a woman who gives everything that she has to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past come hunting her.(n)

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Edith returns the abandoned items from Anita Mui's house to its original senders after the death of the famous Cantopop diva in 2003. The film revives five close fans' collective image and memory of Mui.(n)

programme.title: Who's The Woman, Who's The Man
programme.desc: The sequel to the comedy He's a Woman, She's a Man picks up right where the original left off! Music producer Sam and his cross-dressing protege Wing have finally professed their love for another, but now what?(n)

programme.title: The Unity Of Heroes
programme.desc: This film tells the story of master Huang Feihong's calm and sagacious characteristics, and the double worries of the provocation of Beiquan and the invasion of foreigners.(n)

programme.title: Fight Back To School 2
programme.desc: Despite being demoted, devoted cop Sing longs to win back the respect of his peers. When Sing is reassigned to an exclusive international school and uncovers a lucrative arms smuggling ring, he may have finally stumbled upon the case that will get him back on the beat.(n)

programme.title: Cape No. 7
programme.desc: Seven people who were not expected to be great formed this impossible band, performing passionately and feverishly as if they had no past and no future.(n)

programme.title: Detective Chinatown
programme.desc: This action-packed comedy follows Qin Feng and his second cousin, Tang Ren, Chinatown's top detective, as they investigate a bizarre murder in which they become the main suspects. They find the world against them with just seven days to solve the murder case.(n)

programme.title: Super Express
programme.desc: A modest super-express delivery courier gets entangled in a spiral of adventure and romance in Shanghai.(n)

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Edith returns the abandoned items from Anita Mui's house to its original senders after the death of the famous Cantopop diva in 2003. The film revives five close fans' collective image and memory of Mui.(n)

programme.title: Godspeed
programme.desc: A Taiwanese drug mule has his foolproof smuggling method thrown out of whack when he catches a ride with the wrong cab driver, in this highly-entertaining caper starring Hong Kong comedy legend Michael Hui.(n)

programme.title: The Return Of The Cuckoo
programme.desc: After Kwan Ho marries and migrates to America, Man Cho continues with his life in Macau. He is a busy tour guide and has developed a close bond with his mute friend Kiki.(n)

programme.title: Ode To My Father
programme.desc: During the Korean war, a young boy is separated from his father, but in their parting moments he promises to take care of the family. As he grows up, he experiences some incredible events.(n)

programme.title: The Kid From The Big Apple
programme.desc: As Sarah's mother has to relocate to China on a work assignment, she has to turn to her estranged father back in Malaysia. To a 12-year-old contemporary youngster like Sarah, Malaysia seems like her worst nightmare come true.(n)

programme.title: Legend Of The Demon Cat
programme.desc: In the Tang Dynasty, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an City, causing a series of strange events. Poet Bai Letian and Monk Kukai join hands to investigate the death of Concubine Yang.(n)

programme.title: Line Walker 2
programme.desc: After they uncover evidence that there is corruption in the police force, three police officers in Hong Kong try to discover which of them can be trusted.(n)

programme.title: Love On A Diet
programme.desc: Mimi Mo is a young exchange student in Japan who fell in love with a budding pianist, Kurokawa. Kurokawa leaves for the USA and returns to Japan as a famous musician. Mimi deals with her depression by eating and now weighs over 300 pounds. Mimi meets Fatty who helps her diet.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Duet
programme.desc: The story of rich kid Lee Mong Fong being entangled in a driving penalty points scandal becomes an overnight sensation in Hong Kong. The incident's only witness, Meng Tzi Leung, refuses to cooperate with the police. Detective Lau Mong Long goes undercover to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Omotenashi
programme.desc: Jacky is the heir to a construction company in Taiwan. His father sends him to Kyoto to oversee the renovation of a hotel they had bought. Jacky goes to get back with his ex-girlfriend and to sell the hotel.(n)

programme.title: Colour Of The Truth
programme.desc: Wong Jiang and Seven-Up are good friends who serve on the police force. Unknown to honest cop Wong, Seven-Up is a corrupt police officer who has ties to the underground. During a big stake-out, a showdown leaves Seven-Up dead. His son Coke returns years later to avenge his father.(n)

programme.title: Forever (Sg)
programme.desc: Joey, a video consultant, shares romantic 'faux' wedding videos. The idea of fantasy and reality is blurred when she falls madly in love with a handsome music teacher from Taiwan.(n)

programme.title: Grey Met Shrek
programme.desc: Sometimes fairy tales don't turn out the way you expect. Grey is an office worker with a shopping addiction. One day, just after being fired, she sees a gorgeous pair of shoes. Before she fully understood what she was doing she's stolen the shoes, and in a bid to escape she climbs into a truck.(n)

programme.title: Huat The Fish
programme.desc: This story revolves around the lives of four fishermen who are buddies from a fishing village at Pulau Ketam. In order to settle a huge loan, the four buddies decide to venture into robbery. In their attempt, the four buddies crash into a real robbery scene.(n)

programme.title: The House That Never Dies II
programme.desc: During the last years of the Republic, the country was in chaos. With the warlords' mutiny in the capital, Marshal Zhang Zhisheng was forced to marry the great warlord's daughter Ji Jincui.(n)

programme.title: Double Tap
programme.desc: What begins as an innocuous entry into a gun competition eventually steers Rick towards a path of fatal rivalry. Four members of a G4 unit have been murdered; the suspects clear out any possible evidence. A top CID officer, Miu, narrows the suspect list down to Rick.(n)

programme.title: Pee Nak
programme.desc: Three men on their way to monk-hood don't realise the temple at which they will receive their ordination is cursed by the wrath of Pee Nak, a mythical giant snake.(n)

programme.title: Memory Eclipse - Final Round
programme.desc: One night while driving a taxi, former boxer Ma inadvertently rescues Yu Qing, a pregnant nightclub hostess, from a dangerous gangster. They run away and move constantly in order to stay hidden from the underworld. But their past eventually catches up to them.(n)

programme.title: The Witness
programme.desc: Lu Xiao Xing is a rookie cop who goes to a night club to find her adoptive brother and bring him home to chastise him for getting expelled from school and pursuing a frivolous dream of being a singer. As they argue in the car, her brother sends the car flying off the overpass.(n)

programme.title: The Scoundrels
programme.desc: One night, a robber hijacks Rui when he accidentally spots a seriously injured woman in the vehicle. Now the police and the public see Rui as the suspect of the bank robbery. How can Rui get himself out of this quagmire?(n)

programme.title: The Kid From The Big Apple 2
programme.desc: The sequel to the critically-acclaimed The Kid From The Big Apple. Sarah is back in Malaysia to spend her holiday with grandpa, who is showing signs of dementia.(n)

programme.title: Grace
programme.desc: Ple loves spending time with her best friend Care, who is popular for being cute. Together, they create a Facebook page for Care to share her personal photos and videos to garner 'likes' from the public.(n)

programme.title: The Lion Roars
programme.desc: In the Sung Dynasty, beautiful Liu is known for scaring away potential suitors with her spoiled personality. Enters handsome but struggling poet Chan, and they fall in love. However when Chan is seduced by the princess, Liu is ordered by the Emperor to drink the Lover Eraser elixir.(n)

programme.title: Never Said Goodbye
programme.desc: Jun Hao is a Korean young man who immigrated to Italy with his elder sister when he was little. He accidentally sees the weeping Xiaoyou who had quarreled with her father, and the girl leaves a deep impression on him. On the campus of Language College, Jun Hao meets Xiaoyou again.(n)

programme.title: The Footprints
programme.desc: One night on the way home, Ka Wing has a car accident. Although his life is saved, he is seriously injured. Ka Wing is then told a very shocking news from his doctor.(n)

programme.title: The Merger
programme.desc: An ardent youth, Yip Ka Ka, heads her schoolmates to demonstrate against the demolition of the extraordinary school library. In spite of failure, her personality causes her to shift focus on the preservation of the valuable books together with her geek-looking teacher.(n)

programme.title: For A Few Bullets
programme.desc: When a professional thief sees his lifetime goal of being the best being potentially realised in stealing a rare artifact, he finds himself entangled in a worldwide plot involving the Soviets, the Japanese and a band of outsiders. It's up to him and a special agent to save the world!(n)

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: Yuan Yuan is one of the nation's reputable designers. She has the world at her fingertips, but she carries a secret that she cannot let go. A woman opens up a distant past that she's left behind in Hokkaido.(n)

programme.title: To The Fore
programme.desc: A professional cycling team moves with speed and power. Race after race, the storied Radiant team, led by the brilliant Korean attacker Zheng Zhi Yuan, has become the virtual enemy of all cycling teams.(n)

programme.title: The Great Magician
programme.desc: After the Revolution that overthrew the Qing Dynasty in China and established the republic, China has broken up into fiefdoms held by warlords who are busy fighting one another. A lieutenant is using magic to scare convicts into joining a warlord's army.(n)

programme.title: Memory Eclipse - Begin Again
programme.desc: Ben, a hacker, works at the B&S Memory Bank where an individual's memories can be stored, reviewed as well as erased. He becomes fascinated by Ai: even though she has been physically abused by her lover, she continues to love him deeply and revisit her memories with him constantly.(n)

programme.title: I Am Not Madame Bovary
programme.desc: In order to acquire the apartment they desire, Xuelian and her truck-driver husband conspire to get a "fake" divorce. Once the divorce goes through, however, Xuelian is shocked to discover that her husband has moved into the apartment with another woman.(n)

programme.title: Ah Boys To Men 3: Frogmen
programme.desc: Ah Boys to Men focuses on the theme of the definitive path for all young men in Singapore - National Service. This was Singapore's first military-themed film in 10 years, and also coincided with the 45th year of NS in the country.(n)

programme.title: Take 2
programme.desc: Tiger is a former gangster who took the rap for his boss Blackie; Mad Dog has apparently been convicted of every offence in the Penal Code; Panther was betrayed by his partner during a robbery attempt; while Jian Ren was a soon-to-be groom convicted of sex with an underage prostitute.(n)

programme.title: Shaolin
programme.desc: During the warlord era of early Republican China, a warlord named Hou Jie defeats a rival, Huo Long, and seizes control of Dengfeng. Huo Long flees to Shaolin Temple to hide, but Hou Jie appears and shoots him after tricking him out of his treasure map.(n)

programme.title: The Bold, The Corrupt And The Beautiful
programme.desc: Madame Tang colludes and mediates between the government and private businesses for the benefits of her all-female family. One case does not go as planned, and an entire family close to Madame Tang falls victim to murder, changing Tang's relationships with her own family forever.(n)

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Stephen Chow stars as the youngest son in a family. Dad Roy Chiao only wants his sons to be independent, happily-married men, but it's tough going for the honest, hardworking patriarch.(n)

programme.title: Seventy-Seven Days
programme.desc: Encouraged by Lan Tian, a steadfast girl in a wheelchair, Yang crosses the Qiang Tang dead zone.(n)

programme.title: The Priests
programme.desc: Two priests have to find out if a young girl was attacked by an evil spirit or human molester in order to save her life.(n)

programme.title: The Moment
programme.desc: This film talks about four relationships: A couple breaking up yet holding tight; a father and a daughter meeting up after a long separation; a girl escaping from growing up; and two buddies' reunion after years of misunderstanding.(n)

programme.title: Our Times
programme.desc: Lin Zhen Xin is a high-schooler who harbours a crush on her school's least ordinary, most adored boy Ouyang Fei Fan. After a chance encounter acquaints her with school ruffian Xi Tai Yu, she discovers that they have something in common: He has a crush on Fei Fan's female counterpart, Tao Min Min.(n)

programme.title: The Stool Pigeon
programme.desc: Police Detective Don Lee makes a bad call, causing a close informant to be injured. A year later, he must find a new man to go undercover inside a jewel-theft ring. Ghost Jr. doesn't want to do it, but Lee can offer deals and apply pressure that makes it hard to say no.(n)

programme.title: The Gangs, The Oscars, And The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Director Wenxi and producer BS are two friends trying to make a zombie movie. With insufficient money, they join a local gang to make some extra cash. One day, their big boss Brother Long decides to invest in the movie project.(n)

programme.title: Memory Eclipse - The Moon Is Always Full
programme.desc: On the night of a super moon, radio host Veena receives a call from her mother who had committed suicide. She begins to investigate the cause of her mother's depression and is determined to change the past, but her actions are not without consequences.(n)

programme.title: Mothers
programme.desc: Hyo Jin is a 32-year-old woman. Two years ago, her husband died in an accident. Her husband has a 16-year-old son, Jong Wook, from a previous marriage. Hyo Jin begins to live with Jong Wook.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Mr. Loser ()
programme.desc: Goodbye Mr Loser is a film about a middle-aged nobody who passes out drunk and magically travels back to his school days.(n)

programme.title: The Wrath
programme.desc: In the household of Lee Gyeong-jin, a high-ranking official of Joseon Kingdom, three sons die from an unidentified horror. A woman pregnant with a child of the third son soon learns of the evil spirit that haunts the house.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Wife
programme.desc: A playboy lawyer decides to settle down, and finds a girl from China to have a makeover and become the perfect wife.(n)

programme.title: The Magic Touch
programme.desc: In this sci-fi comedy, Michael Hui plays a fortune-telling con-artist who turns out to really be able to "see the future". The Magic Touch features some early performances of pop star Leon Lai and comedian Dayo Wong.(n)

programme.title: Marry A Rich Man
programme.desc: Me, a delivery girl, declares to the heavens that she must marry a rich man. On a flight to Milan, Me meets Christmas, a cute, rich Hong Kong resident who immediately takes a shine to Me. She thinks she's hit the jackpot, but as soon as they land the two are pick-pocketed.(n)

programme.title: Eighth Happiness
programme.desc: This comedy tells the story of three brothers - the mincingly effeminate Fang Chien Lang, cartoonist Chien Sang, and their middle-aged older sibling, Chien Hui.(n)

programme.title: King Of The Chess
programme.desc: Contrasting dramas of contemporary Taiwan and the Cultural Revolution emphasise the theme of chess as a metaphor for life.(n)

programme.title: Peking Opera Blues
programme.desc: Set in 1913 Beijing, the film depicts the adventures of a team of unlikely heroines: Tsao Wan, a patriotic rebel who dresses as a man; Sheung Hung, a woman in search of a missing box of jewels; and Bai Niu, the daughter of a Peking Opera impresario.(n)

programme.title: Final Victory
programme.desc: Triad leader Big Bo is a violent man, but his younger brother Hung is a nice guy who fusses around him. Bo commits a crime and is sentenced to prison for six months. Before going to prison, Bo entrusts Hung to take care of his two lovers Ping and Mimi.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Town Story
programme.desc: The story begins on the wedding day of Lanjuan, whose marriage is put on hold when gunmen kill her entire family.(n)

programme.title: The Attractive One
programme.desc: Sean Lau plays a barbeque restaurant owner who falls in love with Joey Yung, a beauty thearpist in a pet beauty shop. As fate would have it, Joey has a crush on someone else. Can a 30-odd-year-old who has never experienced love win the love of his life? Or are his efforts doomed to failure?(n)

programme.title: Eastern Condors
programme.desc: Lam is an American army officer given a top-secret mission by the US military. Due to the dangerous nature of the mission, a group of Chinese American soldier convicts are selected to accompany him, led by Tung Ming-sun.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Tin Yau and others come to an agreement; they decide to go straight for Cheung San. Fulfilling Mei Loi's wish, Big Mi keeps in practice to protect Nino. Ding Dong goes to Tsutenkaku in person to look for Cheung San.(n)

programme.title: Fearless Hyena
programme.desc: One day, Lung discovers that Chi Hung was seriously wounded by Yen. Lung is very angry and fights with Yen and his subordinates.(n)

programme.title: Cop Of The Town
programme.desc: Ricky and Romeo are both veterans working in an elite police squad but cannot work well with a new female inspector. One day, Annie, a model, complains of being harassed by her former friend, Ricky. Romeo, who likes to flirt, takes up the case.(n)

programme.title: Lai Shi, China's Last Eunuch
programme.desc: In a village in the Shantung Province, Lai Shi, the nine-year-old son of a poor family, decides to be a eunuch. Finding no place for himself in the service of the Emperor, this eunuch's life goes through dramatic turns, eventually taking him to a railway station, where fate takes a hand.(n)

programme.title: Gunmen
programme.desc: Four friends fight together during the 1935 civil war in China, but go their separate ways afterwards. Two years later, Ding becomes a member of the Shanghai Police Force and is assigned to clean up the drug trafficking trade. He invites the others to join the assignment.(n)

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: Wai Siu Bo is a lecherous wimp, who after saving Chan, the leader of the Heaven and Earth society, is made a member. After a botched first assignment for the group, he is made a servant to the Emperor, the very person the Heaven and Earth society wants to overthrow.(n)

programme.title: Royal Tramp II
programme.desc: Lone-er, a member of the St Dragon Sect, is bent on eliminating the person who disclosed her true identity - Wilson Bond. But more complications ensue when Lone-er is assigned to protect the Prince, whose servant is none other than Wilson Bond.(n)

programme.title: Dream Of Desire
programme.desc: Dream of Desire revolves around the complicated love affairs among two guys and three girls.(n)

programme.title: Oh My Cops
programme.desc: Buddy cops Porky and Big Mouth are promoted to the anti-prostitution division after solving a robbery case. To crack down on a prostitution ring, the bumbling duo arrange for Margaret to go undercover.(n)

programme.title: Duel To The Death
programme.desc: The directorial debut of Tony Ching Siu-tung is a groundbreaking martial arts epic that tells of a secret confrontation between ancient adversaries China and Japan. Once each decade, the nations choose their most skilled swordsmen to a clandestine duel to the death.(n)

programme.title: Long And Winding Road
programme.desc: Leslie and Tony, two bachelors, are bosom friends. Leslie is a wandering soul who seems unable to settle down. Tony is a frustrated musician and a part-time worker at an elderly home. He doesn't like old people, but works there only to get close to his dream girl Wai.(n)

programme.title: Happy Ghost II
programme.desc: The ghost of Scholar Stewart Pik reincarnates and is now a high school teacher named Hong Sam Kwai. Kwai becomes a victim to endless pranks by his students until he is able to counteract with his gift of magical powers.(n)

programme.title: C'est La Vie, Mon Cheri
programme.desc: A jazz musician who has problems in both his life and career moves into a poor neighbourhood. There, he meets a girl who starts to become interested in him because of his saxophone skills.(n)

programme.title: Passion
programme.desc: Sylvia Chang performs in a tragic but romantic love story between two women and a man.(n)

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: A former Buddhist monk returns to the ordinary world to track down the killers of his friend. He soon makes acquaintance with charming policewoman Li Feng Yi who arrests him for a strip performance in front of a public audience.(n)

programme.title: Till Death Do We Scare
programme.desc: The ghosts of the deceased husbands of three-time widow Olivia Cheng try to break the curse by fixing her up with Alan Tam.(n)

programme.title: Forever Young
programme.desc: While on a Thai sex tour, Eric Tsang's pals drink a potion that turns them into kids. Can Eric steer them back to adulthood?(n)

programme.title: Tiger Cage 2
programme.desc: An ex-cop and divorce lawyer team up with a gangster to clear their names after getting involved in a dirty money scheme led by a vicious money launderer.(n)

programme.title: All The Wrong Clues
programme.desc: A private investigator and a police inspector team up to pursue a notorious mobster who is plotting to milk an old millionaire. The investigator crosses paths with a femme fatale and silly gangsters.(n)

programme.title: The Ghost Snatchers
programme.desc: A big party is going on in a newly-built skyscraper. Under their very noses, sultry Judy is snatched by ghosts. She is recruited by the ghost king to lure people into death.(n)

programme.title: Funny Triple
programme.desc: Funnymen Eric Tsang and Anthony Chan play CIDs Woodpecker and Gold Finger. They are assigned to nail the nefarious gang boss Brother Shing. Unfortunately, cracks begin to show in their friendship one day when beautiful policewoman Gigi joins their team.(n)

programme.title: Armour Of God II
programme.desc: Jackie Chan returns as grave robber Asian Hawk, who's contracted to find a hidden cache of Nazi gold. His journey leads him to various exotic locales and companionship with not one, but three comely females of differing origin.(n)

programme.title: School On Fire
programme.desc: Chu Yuen Fong is a student who witnesses a triad beating, and is pressured by cops and teachers into testifying against the attackers. This is just Fong's initiation into the dark and disturbingly corrupt world of Hong Kong triads.(n)

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: The "Saint of Sword" Ye Gu Cheng asks imperial agent Dragon Nine to arrange for him a duel against the "God of Sword" Ximen Chui Xue, atop the Forbidden Palace. Nine finds out in his investigation that the duel is actually just a cover for a conspiracy to assassinate the Emperor.(n)

programme.title: Witch From Nepal
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat accidentally gains an antique that a witch from Nepal tries to claim back.(n)

programme.title: The Wrong Couples
programme.desc: In this award-winning comedy drama, spinster Josephine Siao and sailor Richard Ng are an odd couple forced to live under the same roof.(n)

programme.title: The Royal Scoundrel
programme.desc: Beach Boy and Mrs. Chow have been partners in the police force for years. While investigating a case involving fake money, Beach Boy meets Ah Yuk, whose step-father was one of the criminals who had been arrested by him.(n)

programme.title: Prison On Fire
programme.desc: Yiu is sentenced to three years for manslaughter, while Ching was sent to prison for killing his wife over her being a prostitute. The inmates decide to go on hunger strike to protest against a cigarette price rise, and this causes problems with "Assassin".(n)

programme.title: The Adventurers ()
programme.desc: As his parents are murdered by their good friend Ray , Andy is determined to take revenge for them when he grows up.(n)

programme.title: Profiles Of Pleasure
programme.desc: In 1930s Hong Kong, Officer Adam tries to enforce a ban on prostitution, but falls for Rosamund Kwan and Carina Lau instead.(n)

programme.title: City On Fire
programme.desc: An undercover cop infiltrates a gang of thieves who plan to rob a jewellery store.(n)

programme.title: The Lost Souls
programme.desc: The Ling family are hoping to migrate to Canada, but they all die in a gas-poisoning accident. It turns out migrating in the next life takes money, too. In order to raise funds to head west, the Lings return to the mortal world and get to work.(n)

programme.title: Where's Officer Tuba?
programme.desc: Officer Tuba and Police Detective Chow attempt to hunt down a band of blackmailers. Unsuccessful in capturing the gang, Chow is gunned down and in his dying moment makes Tuba promise that he will defeat the gangsters and avenge his death.(n)

programme.title: Zodiac Killers
programme.desc: Three young Chinese - Ben, Ming and Chuck - come to Japan for study and adventure. Ming wants to make it big fast. So he marries Yuriko, sister of underworld godfather Ishikawa.(n)

programme.title: In The Line Of Duty III
programme.desc: Special Duties Unit officer Cynthia Khan joins forces with Japanese agents to track down murderous Red Army terrorists.(n)

programme.title: Saga Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: The Holy Maiden of Hell, Ashura possesses immense power that can destroy humanity. Buddhist monks trap her in a deep cave to keep her from falling into evil hands. Kind-hearted Abbot Jiku grants her wish to enjoy the human world for seven days.(n)

programme.title: An Autumn's Tale
programme.desc: This story deals with two people from different social backgrounds who begin the unlikeliest of romances in a land far from home.(n)

programme.title: Royal Warriors
programme.desc: Policewoman Michelle Yeoh goes after revenge-seeking villains with the help of Michael Wong and Japanese agent Henry Sanada.(n)

programme.title: All Night Long
programme.desc: This black comedy stars Dodo Cheng as a mousy teacher whose life is changed after an unwitting encounter with a corpse and $40 million.(n)

programme.title: The Contract
programme.desc: Struggling actor Chih-Wen got a raw deal from his company by signing a binding eight-year contract. Soon, he receives a better offer from a rival company. He and his brother, with the help of magician Shih-Chieh, attempt to steal the contract from his ruthless manager.(n)

programme.title: Faces Of Horror
programme.desc: Four youngsters return to the house that claimed their friend's life to confront the demon. A single mother and her daughter live with a curse and a wandering ghost searching for her living lover.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Butcher
programme.desc: Lam Sai Wing, Master Wong Fei Hung's eldest disciple, is falsely trapped and accused by Ko who schemes to rape Lam's sister-in-law. What a trick!(n)

programme.title: Love Unto Wastes
programme.desc: Chow is assigned to investigate a murder case. He discovers the complicated relationship among four suspects.(n)

programme.title: The Last Message
programme.desc: Tim and Lee are employees of a mental hospital working as an orderly and nurse respectively. One day a crazy man named Cheng Ming, who carries a bag of trash, is institutionalised. Tim and Lee discover that the bag is full of artifacts from the Ming Dynasty.(n)

programme.title: Paper Marriage
programme.desc: An illegal immigrant with no Green Card is subject to humiliation, and does odd things to survive - like false marriage.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: At last, Ding Dong dies in the arms of Cheung San. Cheung San compels Tin Yau to compete with him by killing Kau. Meanwhile, Nuwa puts a blood curse on the Five Colours Ambassadors to make them be at her command.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Lord
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars as Dragon, a rebellious young man who is always getting into trouble along with his best friend, Cowboy. The friends meet Tiger, a man in hiding from the Chinese Imperial Guardsmen who conspired with him to steal a number of priceless artifacts from the Forbidden City.(n)

programme.title: The Lion Roars
programme.desc: In the Sung Dynasty, beautiful Liu is known to scare away all potential suitors with her spoiled personality. Enters handsome and struggling poet Chan, and they fall in love. But when Chan is seduced by the princess, Liu is ordered by the Emperor to drink the Lover Eraser elixir.(n)

programme.title: The Unmatchable Match
programme.desc: Ruthless gangster Shing Fui-On pulls off a daring and violent heist of diamonds. He then enlists the aid of longtime triad member Chan Wai-Man to arrange a buyer for them.(n)

programme.title: Moon Stars & Sun
programme.desc: Chu, a young lady, is forced by her abusive father to sell her virginity. Far more experienced are Gigi, a lady who does what she must to spring her convict husband from prison, and Porsche, an ageing call girl still clinging to the hope of finding true love.(n)

programme.title: Tiger Cage
programme.desc: A team of cops get brutally exposed to violence after raiding a drug operation and discovering a link between a few members of the police force and an American crime syndicate dealing with drug trafficking.(n)

programme.title: The Way Of Dragon
programme.desc: A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye My Love
programme.desc: Through a blood test, Lindy knows that she is been suffering from blood cancer. Lindy decides to move in a new flat where there occupies a notorious man who is a hot-tempered crook.(n)

programme.title: Tiger On Beat II
programme.desc: A visit by Conan Lee, the USA-born nephew of cop Danny Lee, leads them on a wild chase to nab the killer stalking Elizabeth Lee.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Vampire
programme.desc: A classic Hong Kong vampire comedy about Taoist priests who inadvertently turn a corpse into a murderous zombie. The planned reburial of a village elder goes awry as the corpse resurrects into a hopping, bloodthirsty vampire, threatening mankind.(n)

programme.title: On Trial
programme.desc: Three young men are on the edge of losing direction of their future. Will the way ahead be a broad, bright road or be full of thistles and thorns?(n)

programme.title: Pom Pom
programme.desc: Ah Chau and Beethoven are a pair of cops investigating a drug lord, but their ineptitude threatens to derail the case.(n)

programme.title: Zu Warriors From The Magic Mount
programme.desc: Set in fifth-century China, Ti Ming-chi is a young innocent from the West Zu army who wandered away from the battlefield and into a magical underworld filled with demons and murderous swordsmen.(n)

programme.title: Heart Against Hearts
programme.desc: George Lam and Carol Cheng play a couple who finally settle down after a long-running love marathon. Their troubles begin when George loses his job and becomes a house-husband, while Carol and daughter (Vivian Chow) become the breadwinners of the family.(n)

programme.title: It's A Mad Mad Mad World 3
programme.desc: The Biu family collect their lottery winnings in Canada and return to Hong Kong, minus the second daughter due to a quarrel. After Mrs. Biu shows off her money to her old friends, she loses it all in a robbery. Now void of their new-found wealth, the Biu family must start over from scratch.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: To prevent Siu Ling from shedding tears, Tin Yau performs the Forgetting Love Curse on her, which changes her personality. Cheung San demands the death of Fan Yan and others in order to return the human spirits to Nuwa.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Scoundrels
programme.desc: Valentino is a mediocre con-artist who crosses paths with Kwan, a fellow con-artist. Together, they impersonate various people and create numerous schemes to make money. Meanwhile, gangsters are making a scheme of their own.(n)

programme.title: United We Stand
programme.desc: Coach Wong is in charge of a girls' summer track training programme. Though the girls are initially skeptical of Wong's abilities, she earns their respect by beating them in a race every time.(n)

programme.title: It's A Mad Mad Mad World 2
programme.desc: The Biu family's luck changes as Bill's job promotion and his daughters' education and work send the entire family to lead their new lives in Canada, where new misadventures await.(n)

programme.title: It's A Drink! It's A Bomb
programme.desc: An explosives expert builds a new-fangled bomb that's disguised as a can of cola. He sells it to evil Japanese terrorists Eddy Ko and Tsui Kam-Kong, but not before his assistant absconds with the cola. During the ensuing chase, three mismatched strangers are brought together.(n)

programme.title: Fatal Love
programme.desc: A romantic thriller with lovers Leslie Cheung and Cherie Chung facing death at the hands of her gangster ex-boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: Battle Creek Brawl
programme.desc: Set in the wild days of the roaring 1920s, this movie tells the story of a courageous martial arts expert who almost single-handedly takes on the mob. Machine guns are of no avail against his lightning-quick hands and feet.(n)

programme.title: Swordsman
programme.desc: The Sunflower Scripture is suddenly stolen from the Forbidden City. In order to avoid any scandal, head eunuch Koo Jin-foo appoints Cho Leng-tsan to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Mr Boo Meets Pom Pom
programme.desc: Mr. Boo is a mastermind in the forensic department of the Royal Hong Kong Police Force. Despite his tremendous success in his work, he on at the verge of losing his beautiful and young wife to a handsome billionaire, Yang.(n)

programme.title: Island, The
programme.desc: This story takes place on a deserted island inhabited by only one family - a mother and her three sons.(n)

programme.title: Project A II
programme.desc: Dragon Ma is assigned to a corrupt police precinct, and brings a squad of righteous officers with him to clean up the territory. But the influence of corrupt Superintendent Chun runs deep, and some of the pirates who threatened Ma in Project A are back looking for revenge.(n)

programme.title: Aces Go Places II
programme.desc: Unfazed by their new popularity, King Kong and Kodojak continue to pal around, find romantic misadventures, annoy the returning Inspector "Hot Tongue" Ho, get framed for various crimes, and still regroup in time to rout the bad guys and save the day.(n)

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: In World War II Shanghai, Tony Leung is torn between his duty to China and his love for nightclub singer Anita Mui.(n)

programme.title: City Hunter
programme.desc: A self-indulgent private investigator winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists and scarce food.(n)

programme.title: One Night Food Trip- International Edition 2
programme.desc: Different Korean celebrities team up with different Asian local stars, setting off a brand-new round of gourmet journeys in Philippines, Malaysia, Taiwan and Seoul!(n)

programme.desc: Star cast and K-beauty experts join to find out the latest local beauty trends and introduce make-up skills tailor-made for Malaysians!(n)
